_header: Why dare I not complain to my lady
Subjects: love lyrics; women, praise of; songs

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
Why dare I not compleyn to my ladyWhie woll I not aske grace in
                    humble wyseSythe I knowe welle that she ys verraye wyssebothe fayre
                    and good dyscrete and womanly
